EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Executive_Dinner_Houston_Q116.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering to attend the dinner tomorrow night. We look forward to seeing you!
Thursday, February 25, 2016
Starting @ 6:30 PM
Pappas Bros. Steakhouse <[[https://www.google.com/maps/dir/]]> Houston Galleria 5839 Westheimer Rd. Houston, Texas 77057
Questions?
For questions, contact Jay Lewis @ jlewis@pivotal.io or 713-898-9615.
